text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco I'm being diagnosed with Covid-19 on July 28th.  They say it's a mild one since my chest is clear after X-ray.  Never in my craziest dream that the president of USA could be this stupid and ignorant!! I wished that or President is #jacindaardern!
